reviewText:
Candy Goes to Hollywood is a essential legit "Classic"
On the same level as Debbie Does Dallas, The Devil in Miss Jones and Deep Throat

If you can get your hands on this laserdisc for a cheap price snatch it up
It's very rare and out of print (Only seen it on Ebay once and it sold for over $25.00) over a decade ago
It's also a Image Entertainment laserdisc = HQ home video release

This is a must have laserdisc for any die hard collector's
